original_text: For it came to pass, when David was in Edom, and Joab the captain of the host was gone up to bury the slain, after he had smitten every male in Edom;
korean_text: 전에 다윗이 에돔에 있을 때에 군대 지휘관 요압이 가서 죽임을 당한 자들을 장사하고 에돔의 남자를 다 쳐서 죽였는데

sentences.original_text: and Joab the captain of the host was gone up
after he had smitten every male in Edom
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 에돔의 모든 남자를 친 후에
